channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: I’m a PhD candidate at the Tum Center for Translational Cancer Research (TranslaTum) and at the Chair of Experimental Bioinformatics. I received both my B.Sc. (2016) and my M.Sc. (2018) in Biomedical engineering from Politecnico di Milano, Italy. During my studies, I had the chance to work as an intern at Industrie Biomediche Insubri S.A (Mezzovico-Vira, Switzerland) and to spend one year at ETH Zurich, where I worked on my Master’s Thesis project “Development of advanced modeling techniques for Raman based spectral data of bioprocesses” in the Morbidelli Group.
